item.title: Backing Up Broadband
item.description: Over the past few decades, broadband internet has become essential for businesses, with speeds and data usage skyrocketing. This begs the question: what happens if your internet goes down? We’ve Quietly Become Dependent The shift to digital operations has been so gradual that many businesses don’t realize the impact of a complete internet outage. You understand the consequences of a power outage, but have you considered how to maintain operations if your internet connection fails?
